subject: Sports Injuries
Football
College Athletics
Education (Secondary)
lead_paragraph: The Gridiron Heroes Spinal Cord Injury Foundation seeks to assist injured high school football players, and prompted S.M.U. Coach June Jones to establish a similar foundation for injured college athletes.
snippet: The Gridiron Heroes Spinal Cord Injury Foundation seeks to assist injured high school football players, and prompted S.M.U. Coach June Jones to establish a similar foundation for injured college athletes.
